representation_information.name: Digital Talking Book. ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2005
representation_information.description: NISO Digital Talking Book Standard, ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2005, defines the format and content of the electronic file set that comprises a digital talking book (DTB) and establishes a limited set of requirements for DTB playback devices.

extras.field: opf, xml, ncx, mp4, mp3, wav

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
